name: Inventory FIFO Violation
description: This table complements the 'Inventory' table only. It contains batch numbers of transactions that violated FIFO based on the current inventory.
A transaction violates FIFO if the material has an expiration date after the expiration date of the same material in stock.
Only transactions with movement types 261, 601, 641, and 541 are considered in this table. Meanwhile, current inventory refers to inventory without stock category.
